attributes.action: A secondary school for Edenbridge Kent
attributes.additional_details:
The Eden Valley School, which is now the site of the Eden Centre, closed its gates in August 2002 and residents have been campaigning for a new school ever since.
There is an increase of homes being developed in Edenbridge which means an increase of families, the town is getting bigger and no provisions are being made.
We are calling for a secondary school in Edenbridge.
